title: How to Create a Vintage Bedspring Wreath

steps.headline: Obtain 12 to 24 old bed springs.
steps.description: If you have an old mattress on hand you can obtain the springs easily but slashing open the mattress and retrieving the springs.

steps.headline: Hit garage sales or even a mattress store to find bed springs (if not readily available at your home).
Pick up craft wire so you can tie the springs together.
steps.description: For best results, purchase wire that is the same colors as your bed springs. And older, antique look may require black wire whereas newer springs may do better with silver/grey wire.

steps.headline: Find a strong pair of wire cutters so you can size the craft wire appropriately.
Inspect and clean springs.
steps.description: Although you may be looking for an antique appeal, make sure your springs have been relieved of all dust and debris. Use mild dish soap and a clean rag to wipe down each spring.

steps.headline: Position springs in a circle to “sketch” out your wreath.
Wire springs together.
Spray paint it.

text:
Hunt for Supplies Obtain 12 to 24 old bed springs. If you have an old mattress on hand you can obtain the springs easily but slashing open the mattress and retrieving the springs. Hit garage sales or even a mattress store to find bed springs (if not readily available at your home). Pick up craft wire so you can tie the springs together. For best results, purchase wire that is the same colors as your bed springs. And older, antique look may require black wire whereas newer springs may do better with silver/grey wire. Find a strong pair of wire cutters so you can size the craft wire appropriately. Create Wreath Inspect and clean springs. Although you may be looking for an antique appeal, make sure your springs have been relieved of all dust and debris. Use mild dish soap and a clean rag to wipe down each spring. Position springs in a circle to “sketch” out your wreath. Before you wire it together you’ll want to see how it will appear. Start by placing one spring on a flat surface, large spring facing downward (on the surface). {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e1/Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-6Bullet1.jpg/v4-459px-Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-6Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e1/Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-6Bullet1.jpg/v4-759px-Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-6Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Next to the first spring, place another spring, this time with the small spring on the surface and the large spring at the top. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/87/Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-6Bullet2.jpg/v4-459px-Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-6Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/87/Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-6Bullet2.jpg/v4-759px-Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-6Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Continue this as a pattern while creating a circular shape. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/aa/Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-6Bullet3.jpg/v4-459px-Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-6Bullet3.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/aa/Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-6Bullet3.jpg/v4-759px-Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-6Bullet3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Wire springs together. Cut two to three pieces of wire to bind the springs to one another. Wind one wire to join the top springs and one to join the bottom springs. Considering doubling up if the springs are made from a heavy material or if they aren’t holding together with just one on each side. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c4/Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-7Bullet1.jpg/v4-459px-Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-7Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c4/Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-7Bullet1.jpg/v4-759px-Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-7Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Continue winding the wire around the springs to join them together. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/7b/Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-7Bullet2.jpg/v4-459px-Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-7Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/7b/Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-7Bullet2.jpg/v4-759px-Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-7Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Spray paint it. Add decors like gems, stones or ribbons. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/47/Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-8Bullet1.jpg/v4-459px-Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-8Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/47/Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-8Bullet1.jpg/v4-759px-Create-a-Vintage-Bedspring-Wreath-Step-8Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Hang it on your door!
